languages.text: "Забытье экстаза... как давно я не впадал в него". {n}Он потягивается всем телом.{/n} "Твои слуги долго не знали истинного страха — и тот ужас, что они испытали, когда клинки начали вспарывать их тела, был особенно... мощным. А ты... ты был{mf||а} хорош{mf||а}. Лучше, чем я мог представить. Ты, словно губка, впитываешь все, что я могу тебе дать".

"The oblivion of ecstasy... it has been so long since the last time I plunged into it." {n}He does a full-body stretch.{/n} "Your servants had not known true fear in a long time — and the terror they felt when my blades began to rip open their bodies was especially... powerful. And you... you were good. Better than I could have imagined. You are like a sponge, absorbing everything I can give you."
languages.original_text: "Забытье экстаза... как давно я не впадал в него". {n}Он потягивается всем телом.{/n} "Твои слуги долго не знали истинного страха — и тот ужас, что они испытали, когда клинки начали вспарывать их тела, был особенно... мощным. А ты... ты был{mf||а} хорош{mf||а}. Лучше, чем я мог представить. Ты, словно губка, впитываешь все, что я могу тебе дать".

And you... you were good. Better than I could have imagined. You are like a sponge, absorbing everything I can give you."

And you... you were good. Better than I could have imagined. You are like a sponge, absorbing everything I can give you."

"The oblivion of ecstasy... it has been so long since the last time I plunged into it." {n}He does a full-body stretch.{/n} "Your servants had not known true fear in a long time — and the terror they felt when my blades began to rip open their bodies was especially... powerful. And you... you were good. Better than I could have imagined. You are like a sponge, absorbing everything I can give you."

languages.text: “如此忘我的陶醉……我已经很久没有如此沉浸其中了。”{n}他伸展着身体。{/n}“你的仆人很久都没有体会过真正的恐惧了。当我的利刃撕开他们的身体时，他们感受到的恐惧尤为……强烈。而你……你做的很好，比我想象得更加出色。你就像海绵一样，饥渴地吸收着我传授给你的一切。”
languages.original_text: "The oblivion of ecstasy... it has been so long since the last time I plunged into it." {n}He does a full-body stretch.{/n} "Your servants had not known true fear in a long time — and the terror they felt when my blades began to rip open their bodies was especially... powerful. And you... you were good. Better than I could have imagined. You are like a sponge, absorbing everything I can give you."

traits.locale_text: “如此忘我的陶醉……我已经很久没有如此沉浸其中了。”{n}他伸展着身体。{/n}“你的仆人很久都没有体会过真正的恐惧了。当我的利刃撕开他们的身体时，他们感受到的恐惧尤为……强烈。而你……你做的很好，比我想象得更加出色。你就像海绵一样，饥渴地吸收着我传授给你的一切。”

languages.text: 「エクスタシーの忘却…最後に飛び込んでから随分時間が経ったな」{n}マラズハイは全身をぐっと伸ばす。{/n}「お前の従者達は、長い間本物の恐怖を知らなかった。そして、俺の刃が奴らの体を引き裂き始めたときに感じたあの恐怖は特別…強力だった。それにお前…良かったぜ。想像していたよりもずっと良かった。まるでスポンジだ。教えたことをすべて吸収する」
languages.original_text: "The oblivion of ecstasy... it has been so long since the last time I plunged into it." {n}He does a full-body stretch.{/n} "Your servants had not known true fear in a long time — and the terror they felt when my blades began to rip open their bodies was especially... powerful. And you... you were good. Better than I could have imagined. You are like a sponge, absorbing everything I can give you."

traits.locale_text: 「エクスタシーの忘却…最後に飛び込んでから随分時間が経ったな」{n}マラズハイは全身をぐっと伸ばす。{/n}「お前の従者達は、長い間本物の恐怖を知らなかった。そして、俺の刃が奴らの体を引き裂き始めたときに感じたあの恐怖は特別…強力だった。それにお前…良かったぜ。想像していたよりもずっと良かった。まるでスポンジだ。教えたことをすべて吸収する」

languages.text: «El olvido del éxtasis... ha pasado mucho tiempo desde la última vez que me entregué completamente a él». {n}Estira todo su cuerpo.{/n} «Tus sirvientes llevaban también demasiado sin conocer el verdadero terror... el que han sentido cuando mis hojas han empezado a desgarrar sus cuerpos era especialmente... potente. Y tú... eres especial. Mejor de lo que podría haber imaginado. Eres como una esponja, absorbiendo todo lo que puedo darte».
languages.original_text: "The oblivion of ecstasy... it has been so long since the last time I plunged into it." {n}He does a full-body stretch.{/n} "Your servants had not known true fear in a long time — and the terror they felt when my blades began to rip open their bodies was especially... powerful. And you... you were good. Better than I could have imagined. You are like a sponge, absorbing everything I can give you."

traits.locale_text: «El olvido del éxtasis... ha pasado mucho tiempo desde la última vez que me entregué completamente a él». {n}Estira todo su cuerpo.{/n} «Tus sirvientes llevaban también demasiado sin conocer el verdadero terror... el que han sentido cuando mis hojas han empezado a desgarrar sus cuerpos era especialmente... potente. Y tú... eres especial. Mejor de lo que podría haber imaginado. Eres como una esponja, absorbiendo todo lo que puedo darte».

languages.text: « La vacuité née de l'extase... Cela faisait bien longtemps que je ne m'y étais pas abandonné, {n}dit-il en étirant consciencieusement tous ses membres.{/n} Vos serviteurs n'avaient pas connu la peur véritable depuis un bon moment, et la terreur qu'ils ont éprouvée quand mes lames ont commencé à les déchiqueter était particulièrement... puissante. Quant à vous, vous vous êtes bien {mf|débrouillé|débrouillée}. Mieux que je l'aurais imaginé, à vrai dire. Vous êtes {mf|pareil|pareille} à un buvard, vous absorbez tout ce que j'ai à vous transmettre. »
languages.original_text: "The oblivion of ecstasy... it has been so long since the last time I plunged into it." {n}He does a full-body stretch.{/n} "Your servants had not known true fear in a long time — and the terror they felt when my blades began to rip open their bodies was especially... powerful. And you... you were good. Better than I could have imagined. You are like a sponge, absorbing everything I can give you."

traits.locale_text: « La vacuité née de l'extase... Cela faisait bien longtemps que je ne m'y étais pas abandonné, {n}dit-il en étirant consciencieusement tous ses membres.{/n} Vos serviteurs n'avaient pas connu la peur véritable depuis un bon moment, et la terreur qu'ils ont éprouvée quand mes lames ont commencé à les déchiqueter était particulièrement... puissante. Quant à vous, vous vous êtes bien {mf|débrouillé|débrouillée}. Mieux que je l'aurais imaginé, à vrai dire. Vous êtes {mf|pareil|pareille} à un buvard, vous absorbez tout ce que j'ai à vous transmettre. »

languages.text: "Das Versinken in der Ekstase ... ich bin schon sehr lange nicht mehr in sie eingetaucht." {n}Er dehnt ausgiebig seinen ganzen Körper.{/n} "Eure Diener verspürten schon lange keine echte Angst mehr – und als meine Klingen ihre Körper aufrissen, war ihr Schrecken besonders ... ausgeprägt. Und Ihr ... Ihr wart gut. Besser als ich mir vorstellen konnte. Ihr seid wie ein Schwamm und saugt alles auf, was ich Euch geben kann."
languages.original_text: "The oblivion of ecstasy... it has been so long since the last time I plunged into it." {n}He does a full-body stretch.{/n} "Your servants had not known true fear in a long time — and the terror they felt when my blades began to rip open their bodies was especially... powerful. And you... you were good. Better than I could have imagined. You are like a sponge, absorbing everything I can give you."

traits.locale_text: "Das Versinken in der Ekstase ... ich bin schon sehr lange nicht mehr in sie eingetaucht." {n}Er dehnt ausgiebig seinen ganzen Körper.{/n} "Eure Diener verspürten schon lange keine echte Angst mehr – und als meine Klingen ihre Körper aufrissen, war ihr Schrecken besonders ... ausgeprägt. Und Ihr ... Ihr wart gut. Besser als ich mir vorstellen konnte. Ihr seid wie ein Schwamm und saugt alles auf, was ich Euch geben kann."

languages.text: "Zevkin unutkanlığı... Bu zevke dalmamın üzerinden çok uzun zaman geçti." {n}Tüm bedeniyle geriniyor.{/n} "Hizmetkârların, gerçek korkuyu çoktandır tatmamışlar. Bıçaklarım bedenlerini kesip biçmeye başladığında hissettikleri dehşet ise bilhassa... Güçlüydü. Sense... Sen harikaydın. Hayal edebileceğimden çok daha iyiydin. Sana verdiğim her şeyi sünger gibi emdin."
languages.original_text: "The oblivion of ecstasy... it has been so long since the last time I plunged into it." {n}He does a full-body stretch.{/n} "Your servants had not known true fear in a long time — and the terror they felt when my blades began to rip open their bodies was especially... powerful. And you... you were good. Better than I could have imagined. You are like a sponge, absorbing everything I can give you."

Bıçaklarım bedenlerini kesip biçmeye başladığında hissettikleri dehşet ise bilhassa... Güçlüydü. Sense... Sen harikaydın. Hayal edebileceğimden çok daha iyiydin. Sana verdiğim her şeyi sünger gibi emdin."
